product.title: InstaTrim 1/2 in. x 20 ft. White PVC Self-Adhesive Flexible Caulk Trim Molding Applicator Tool and Corners
product.description: InstaTrim's easy caulking project kits have all the things you need to get your DIY project completed efficiently. The 1/2 in. x 20 ft. project kit includes two 1/2 in. W x 10 ft. long flexible, self-adhesive trim strips, the InstaTrim applicator tool and a 6-pack of corner and end caps to make installation a breeze. InstaTrim is a versatile self-adhesive trim that removes the mess and the stress from home improvement projects. This trim and caulking alternative is easy-to-use and durable, providing quality results in minimal time and is perfect for use on any trim project - floors, doors, windows, backsplash, toilets, wall corners and more. InstaTrim's unique, patented design provides a clean seal of protection against dust, dirt, moisture, and air movement. Use the applicator tool with 1/2 in. or 3/4 in. W InstaTrim to save time and ensure a smooth, even installation. Our innovative, paintable, corner and end caps add the perfect touch for inside and outside corners and exposed ends. No need to cut precise angles, simply slide our flexible trim behind the corner cap for a clean even finish. Corner and end caps are for use with 1/2 in. wide InstaTrim.
feature_bullets: Designed to cover cracks, gaps, and corners with a finished seal
Made of flexible PVC and putty-like adhesive for durability
Suitable for wood, vinyl, glass, drywall, granite, etc.
descriptive_attributes: Cover cracks, gaps, and corners with a tidy, finished seal using InstaTrim - original flexible trim strips. Made from flexible pvc and putty-like adhesive that doesn't dry out and will move with construction expansion and contraction. These caulk replacement strips need no dry time, they bond with any material that does not have silicone on or embedded in it, and can be used for multipurpose trim projects
Durable materials and a patented design make InstaTrim a go-to for DIY enthusiasts for any trim project in their home or business InstaTrim will last for years as long as it is properly installed

Flexible InstaTrim products work with wood, vinyl, glass, drywall, granite, etc., basically anywhere you need to add trim an important thing to note is that the adhesive will not stick to a surface where silicone or silicone residue, waxes, or oils have been complete instructions are included with each package for cleaning and removing such compounds if properly prepped, these caulk strips will last for years

InstaTrim's adhesive is certified by ASTM - it contains no volatile organic compounds and does not produce off-gassing in fact, there is no cure time it is also mold and mildew resistant to help keep your space clean and safe

InstaTrim was designed in a wedge-shape that fits perfectly in 90° corners the innovative, patented wings press back against the surface and create a second barrier against dust, moisture and air flow we also offer InstaTrim in 5 common decor colors that match any style and color

Easy to work with and flexible so it can bend around an oval toilet base, rounded drop-in sink, or any other curved surface you may encounter this self-adhesive, bendable trim can be used for several DIY home improvement projects and is a great solution for use on floating floors, windows, doors, wall corners, appliances and more

You won't need to mess with gooey adhesive InstaTrim caulk replacement strips are made with the adhesive in place simply prep your surface, peel back the clear liner that covers the adhesive, position the trim, and press it down firmly - that's it InstaTrim takes the mess and hassle out of caulking projects, while still providing great coverage and a professional finish
Our products are ASTM certified and do not contain VOCs

InstaTrim, we pride ourselves in manufacturing the best trim and caulking alternative we strive to provide our customers with a dependable, long-lasting solution to many trim projects experience the quality of manufacturing and see the difference it can make in your home our family-owned small business appreciates our loyal customers and works hard to make sure they are always satisfied with our products
